description:
Luffy`s battle with Lucci reveals the powerful secrets of the rubber man`s second gear, and the Spandam`s thoughtless Buster Call begins with a brutal barrage of cannon balls.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Robin Freed! Luffy vs. Lucci, Showdown Between Leaders
Robin Kaihou! Luffy Tai Lucci Choujou Kessen
Robin est libre ! Luffy contre Lucci : bataille au sommet
Робин спасена! Луффи против Луччи, апогей битвы
روبين حرّة! لوفي ضدّ لوتشي، نزال بين القائدين!
ロビン解放! ルフィ対ルッチ頂上決戦
